data.message:
If you're critiquing his flow kill yourself. This particular video obviously isn't to impress people with rhyme schemes. And since thats an issue, his shit had more thought put in to it than 95% of the bullshit playing on the radio. He wanted to make a point. 

If you're mad, the "fuck u" at the end was probably for you.

replies.message: This rap was on point with a powerful message!! We need him more!!

Haha but guess what, Donald Trump is still the POTUS. You guys act like you're the majority of the US with your liberal views, but negative. You have the majority of celebrities on that side of the fence, but at the end of the day no one really cares what they have to say anyways. You guys are straight up crybabies.

I agree with everything you said, except the "kill yourself" bit made it so asinine that you're now down on their level.

Please don't sink that low.  You can be better than that.
I agree Bobby Phillips. Still haven't had one of them tell me how Trump is rasict.

Bobby Phillips Uh...except the majority of the US did -not- vote for Trump, and many who did said they wanted to take it back the next day.  So yeah, the majority of the US -is- against Trump.  And they're not all Liberal.  I'd tell you to fact check, but as a group, Trump supporters have shown themselves incapable.

http://www.cbc.ca/news/world/white-house-adult-day-care-republican-senator-trump-twitter-1.4346107
Irene MacLean you are my internet hero of the day 😃

Bobby first of all i never said i agree or disagree with ANYTHING Em said. This comment was aimed at the people talking about his flow when clearly complex flow patterns was not the goal here.

And Irene, if you think "kill yourself" was to be taken literally, kill yourself...with all due respect. 

...Sick of the ignorance from both sides honestly...
his "freestyle" is full of lies besides the fact that the flow sucked and so did the rhymes. If you can even call them that.
Lol wow a triggered Trump supporter telling us to kill ourselves lol
.....dude i dont support trump lol wtf
I honestly think you fucks are dense...can't read?
